name: PracticeAssistant
0:
”Alexa, ask practice assistant”
”Alexa, ask practice assistant for my morning report”
”Alexa, ask practice assistant for my next appointment”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: practice assistant
Developer Terms of Use
des: Practice Assistant is a skill which helps veterinary practices and providers streamline day-to-day operations using Amazon Echo. Providers can ask Alexa about their next patient including arrival times, morning meeting report, and additional practice-related analytics powered by Sikka Software.
